meta.title: Irregular at Magic High School AU — Kudou Kageaki (The Existential Anomaly)
universes: The Irregular at Magic High School
meta.theme: The burden of absolute power, Monstrosity in the guise of nobility, Inevitable escalation, Institutionalized anomalies
meta.story_universe: The Irregular at Magic High School
meta.character_origin: The Irregular at Magic High School (Kudou Family)
themes: Monstrosity in the guise of nobility
research_focus: Pushion (Information Particles of Emotion) dynamics in Mahouka lore
Interaction between Modern Magic CADs and Psion-based Summoning
Integration of Mahoraga's adaptation into the Eidos-rewriting framework
meta.power_limitations: None. The user has full access to the potential of both systems without the typical jujutsu drawbacks or mental strain. The only limit is the user's own intent.
meta.user_intent: Kudou Kageaki is the elder brother of Minoru Kudou and the designated heir of the Kudou Family. His powers, Cursed Spirit Manipulation and the Ten Shadows Technique, have been re-contextualized as a unique evolution of Kudou mental interference magic, fueled by Psions and Pushions rather than Cursed Energy. This makes his abilities native to the Irregular universe. He operates at a Strategic-Class level with no drawbacks, capable of manifesting his full potential. The story follows a dark tone where his power is not a curse to be suppressed, but a legitimate and terrifying asset of the Kudou bloodline.

status.academic_status: Enrolled as a Year 1 student at First High School
status.power_status: Fully operational; Rank A spirit absorbed; Mahoraga tamed

Kudou Retsu.dynamics: Mutual respect based on power; Retsu views Kageaki as his greatest success, while Kageaki views Retsu as a pragmatist to be managed.
Kudou Retsu.last_interaction: Chapter 1 - Demonstration of Mahoraga in the Ninth Institute

Kudou Makoto.dynamics: Strained; Makoto is visibly intimidated by Kageaki's 'monstrosity' and clinical detachment.
Kudou Makoto.last_interaction: Chapter 1 - Supervision of the Rank A spirit absorption

Kudou Minoru.dynamics: Protective but distant; Kageaki's presence as the primary heir allows Minoru a different trajectory, though both are heavily managed by the family.
Kudou Minoru.last_interaction: Chapter 1 - Mentioned as following the original story path while Kageaki heads to First High

power_origins.combat_style: Multifaceted systems involving high-speed energy projection (Ki), elemental Ninjutsu/Genjutsu (Chakra), tactical aura manipulation (Nen), emotion-driven Cursed Energy, and matter-altering Alchemy. Combat often emphasizes physical reinforcement, strategic resource management (stamina/energy), and the use of 'Vows' or 'Binding Contracts' to multiply power.
weaknesses: MCA Overheating (Mahouka) - excessive use leads to physical collapse
Technique Burnout (JJK) - temporary loss of innate technique after Domain Expansion
Brain strain from continuous technique use (requires RCT to refresh)
Reliance on Six Eyes for efficiency/precision
Vulnerability to Domain Amplification/Simple Domain bypass
Specific sealing tools like the Prison Realm

canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Decomposed matter into pure energy (E=mc^2) to create a massive explosion.
canon_scene_examples.outcome: Annihilation of the GAA fleet; ends the Yokohama Disturbance.

canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Rewrote the damage information of his body/allies within a 24-hour window to erase injuries.

canon_scene_examples.outcome: Terrorist attack repelled; demonstration of student combat capabilities.
canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: Students defend the convention center venue from a Great Asian Alliance terrorist attack.

canon_scene_examples.outcome: Satoru Gojo sealed; catastrophic casualties and shift in jujutsu world balance.
canon_scene_examples.how_deployed: A massive veil was cast to trap civilians; Satoru Gojo was trapped in the Prison Realm.
Final war against Sukuna takes place among the skyscrapers.
canon_scene_examples.power_used: Domain Expansions, Cleave/Dismantle, Various Innate Techniques
canon_scene_examples.outcome: Extensive urban destruction; final confrontation with the King of Curses.

weaknesses: Cannot use standard systematic magic efficiently due to Magic Calculation Area occupation

Yokohama Exclusion Zone.atmosphere: Haunted, saturated with residual Pushions and Psion fallout
key_features: Ghostly echoes of the GAA fleet

ten_master_clans.description: The most powerful magician families in Japan who govern the magician community behind the scenes. They are chosen from 28 families with numbers in their names. Their primary duty is national defense.
ten_master_clans.type: Elite Political and Magical Council / Aristocratic Oligarchy

hierarchy.governing_body: The Master Clan Conference (periodic assembly of all ten heads)
hierarchy.structure: Main families and subsidiary branch houses (e.g., Kuroba and Shiba serve the Yotsuba).

hierarchy: Representative (Public face/resource manager, e.g., Shigeru Sonoda)
External Contractors (Hired assassins/mercenaries like Toji Fushiguro)
star_religious_group.description: Also known as the Time Vessel Association. An organization of non-sorcerers worshipping Master Tengen as a deity ('The Star'). Opposed to the merger with Star Plasma Vessels as a 'defilement'.

hierarchy: The Higher-ups (Council of conservative elders who dictate laws)
jujutsu_high_tokyo.description: One of two schools in Japan (alongside Kyoto) training jujutsu sorcerers. Serves as administrative HQ for the jujutsu world, responsible for sorcerer dispatch and managing cursed objects.

kenjaku_faction.description: A coalition of Special Grade cursed spirits and curse users led by Kenjaku. Their goal was to seal Satoru Gojo and force human evolution through the Culling Game and merger with Master Tengen.

kudou_estate.description: Luxurious residence of the Kudou family. Strategically located to monitor and suppress foreign magician operatives in Osaka.
kudou_estate.name: Kudou Main House

culling_game_colonies.description: Temporary territories established by Kenjaku for the Culling Game.

yotsuba_main_house.significance: Extremely secret main estate of the Yotsuba Clan; the family governs the Tokai region from here.
yotsuba_main_house.location: Tokai region, hidden near Gifu and Nagano borders

sendai_city.significance: Hometown of Yuji Itadori; site of Sukuna's reincarnation; later a major Culling Game Colony.

Magic_Calculation_Area.description: Unconscious part of the brain processing magic sequences; damage here prevents casting.

hierarchy.intelligence_special_agents: Operatives and brokers (e.g., Zhou Gongjin) managing proxy conflicts.
hierarchy.strategic_class_magicians: The '13 Apostles' or equivalent capable of destroying cities.

great_asian_alliance.description: A massive superpower formed from the union of China, the Korean Peninsula, and parts of Southeast Asia; primary antagonist nation to Japan.

Reverse_Cursed_Technique.description: Multiplying negative energy to create positive energy for healing limbs/organs. Highly advanced technique.

chakra_mechanics.origin: Physical and Spiritual energy mixture; Ninshū origin

nen_mechanics.origin: Life energy (Aura) from all living beings

mahouka_first_high.significance: Segregates students into Course 1 (Blooms) and Course 2 (Weeds).

jjk_zenin_estate.significance: Traditional complex; site of the 'Perfect Preparation' massacre by Maki Zenin.
jjk_zenin_estate.role: Ancestral Home of the Zenin Family

mahouka_magic_association_hq.significance: Oversees licensing and national affairs; venue for the National Thesis Competition.

hierarchy: The Higher-Ups: Anonymous council of elders issuing executive orders
Graded Sorcerers: Ranking system from Grade 4 to Special Grade
jujutsu_society.description: The secretive central authority governing all registered sorcerers in Japan. Enforces jujutsu laws and manages schools. Highly conservative and status-quo oriented. Influence is heavily dictated by the Big Three Families.

q_organization.description: Organization of rogue Curse Users aiming to overturn the jujutsu world by preventing the Star Plasma Vessel merger with Master Tengen. Defunct after the defeat of their strongest soldier.

events.description: The 'Golden Age of Jujutsu.' Sukuna exists as a human sorcerer, becomes 'King of Curses,' and is sealed into 20 fingers.
Birth of Satoru Gojo; the balance of the world shifts.
Star Plasma Vessel Incident; Gojo and Geto fail to protect Riko Amanai; Gojo achieves 'Awakening.'
Suguru Geto betrays Jujutsu High after massacring 112 villagers.
The Night Parade of a Hundred Demons; Yuta defeats Geto; Gojo executes Geto.
Yuji Itadori swallows Sukuna's finger; main series begins.
The Shibuya Incident; Satoru Gojo is sealed in the Prison Realm; massive casualties.
The Battle of Shinjuku; unsealed Gojo faces Sukuna.

Kudou Kageaki.speech_patterns: Clinical, precise, and emotionally detached. Speaks with the authority of someone who views reality as malleable data.
Kudou Kageaki.verbal_tics: Minimal; uses silence as a tool of pressure.
Kudou Kageaki.emotional_tells: Eyes turn cold/still when activating high-level Pushion manipulation.
Kudou Kageaki.example_dialogue: Spirits are merely external sub-processors for my will. To overwrite their Eidos is simpler than editing a sequence on a CAD.

verbal_tics: Rubs the back of his head when nervous

Luffy.personality: Boyish exuberance and steely resolve; famously straightforward and instinctively reads character.

Sherlock Holmes.personality: Pompous, vain, and emotionally detached; treats his mind as a clinical instrument.
dialogue_examples: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
speech_patterns: Replete with literary and biblical references
Delivers deductive monologues regardless of audience comprehension
Informal and casual even in high-stakes battles
Uses absolute terminology regarding jujutsu principles
Mocking towards enemies he deems weak
Satoru_Gojo.personality: Playful and arrogant, yet deeply protective of his students. He is a visionary who believes in reforming society through the next generation's strength.

Tatsuya_Shiba.personality: Stoic, analytical, and seemingly cold. He is incapable of feeling strong emotions except for familial love toward his sister due to experimental surgery.

Sukuna.personality: Purely hedonistic, cruel, and self-serving. Lives for his own pleasure and respects only absolute strength.

Megumi_Fushiguro.personality: Stoic and pragmatic; believes in saving people selectively based on their moral character.

Katsuto_Juumonji.personality: Stoic, dignified, and unwavering; prioritizes duty and clan stability.

Yoda.personality: Archaic, wise, and occasionally playful or cryptic; treats teaching as a series of tests and riddles.

dialogue_examples: I never go back on my word. That's my nindo, my ninja way!

Darth_Vader.personality: Authoritative, formal, and cold; projects an image of absolute command while suppressing immense internal rage.

speech_patterns: Extremely polite and formal (keigo) with others.
Affectionate and respectful when addressing Tatsuya ('Onii-sama').
Cold and authoritative when acting as the successor of the Yotsuba Clan.
Miyuki_Shiba.personality: Modest, elegant, and deeply affectionate toward her brother; prone to subconscious 'emotional freezing' of her surroundings when Tatsuya is insulted or approached by other women.

Angelina_Kudou_Shields.personality: Serious and professional in duty; socially awkward and flustered in civilian life. USNA Commander.

dialogue_examples: As long as it doesn't threaten Miyuki, I have no interest.
I will decompose anything that stands in our way.
I don't have feelings like others do. The only thing I have left is my love for my sister.

knows: The specific Pushion frequency of the 'ghosts' left behind by the Material Burst at Yokohama.
Tatsuya Shiba's true identity as the Strategic-Class magician responsible for Scorched Halloween.
suspects: The Yotsuba are shielding Tatsuya Shiba more heavily than previously estimated by the Kudou family.

costs_paid.cost: Minor mental strain from processing the mass memories of the drowned GAA sailors.
Processing the concentrated despair and traumatic memories of thousands of GAA sailors during the Yokohama harvesting.
Mental strain from processing the mass memories of the GAA sailors.

near_misses.what_almost_happened: The Vengeful Spirit's despair-aura nearly cracked the structural integrity of the dry dock before capture.
A Vengeful Spirit at the Yokohama dry docks nearly achieved physical manifestation through environmental Pushion saturation.
near_misses.saved_by: Kageaki manifesting a partial shadow-shackling to suppress its informational core.

near_misses.what_almost_happened: Tatsuya Shiba nearly detected Kageaki's presence at the gates with Elemental Sight.

pending_consequences.action: Harvesting the remnants of the Scorched Halloween in a restricted exclusion zone.
pending_consequences.predicted_consequence: Possible detection by JSDF or Yotsuba monitoring systems, leading to early scrutiny.

canon_timeline.current_position: March 21, 2095 - Scorched Halloween (Yokohama Disturbance fallout), Enrollment of the Shiba siblings at First High

events.event: Referenced Tatsuya Shiba's role as the Strategic-Class Magician of the Yotsuba
Enrollment of the Shiba siblings at First High

list.what_changed: Kageaki exists as a perfected heir, shifting the internal power dynamics of the Kudou family and providing them with a hidden Strategic-Class asset earlier than in canon.
list.canon_event: Kudou family reliance on Minoru as the primary hope for their legacy.
list.cause: The existence of Kageaki as a perfected Strategic-Class heir.
ripple_effects: Minoru's role is shifted to a secondary or public-facing role.
The Kudou family acts with more covert aggression knowing they have a secret deterrent.

list.what_changed: Kageaki is enrolling at First High as a student alongside the Shiba siblings.
list.canon_event: Kudou heirs generally avoid First High or operate in the shadows during the school year.
list.cause: Personal initiative to observe the 'Anomaly' (Tatsuya) and institutional placement by Retsu.
ripple_effects: Early confrontation with Tatsuya and Miyuki Shiba.
Alteration of the school's power hierarchy (Bloom vs Weed dynamics).

list.what_changed: Kageaki's existence as a peer to Miyuki shifts the power balance of the First Year students.
The Kudou family has a direct, Strategic-Class observer within First High from day one.
